Firebolt.Name: Firebolt
Firebolt.Description: Launch a firebolt at a single orb, destroying it
Firebolt.UnboughtDescription: Want to learn how to throw around some fire? Come here and I'll show you

FireboltDual.Name: Dual Firebolt
FireboltDual.Description: Launch a firebolt at a pair of orbs, destroying them
FireboltDual.UnboughtDescription: With some more funding I think I can develop a way to launch two firebolts at the same time.

FireboltTri.Name: Tri Firebolt
FireboltTri.Description: Launch a firebolt at a trio of orbs, destroying them
FireboltTri.UnboughtDescription: With some more funding I think I can develop a way to launch three firebolts at the same time.

FireboltQuad.Name: Quad Firebolt
FireboltQuad.UnboughtDescription: I'm guessing you can see the pattern now, but I think I can figure out a way to launch four firebolts this time.

FireFlurry.Name: Fire Flurry
FireFlurry.Description: Fling out fire randomly, spreading destruction everywhere it lands.
FireFlurry.UnboughtDescription: I really want to burn some random things. Please get some things for me.

FireRain.Name: Fire Rain
FireRain.Description: Rain down fire randomly, destroying all it touches
FireRain.UnboughtDescription: The last set of things you brought me were fun to burn. Please bring me more!

Fireball.Name: Fireball
Fireball.Description: Launch an exploding fireball at the target location, destroying it and all neighbours
Fireball.UnboughtDescription: I've heard tales of a fabled creature of flame. With it's heart I'm sure I could develop a new spell of some form.

FireballGreater.Name: Greater Fireball
FireballGreater.Description: Launch an exploding greater fireball at the target location, destroying it and all neighbours
FireballGreater.UnboughtDescription: This spell feels... incomplete. I need something hotter. A more powerful heart I think will do it.

FireballGrand.Name: Grand Fireball
FireballGrand.Description: Launch an exploding grand fireball at the target location, destroying it and all neighbours
FireballGrand.UnboughtDescription: This spell is nearly done. I just need something even hotter.

Immolate.Name: Immolate
Immolate.Description: A flash of fire strikes a single monster
Immolate.UnboughtDescription: My flames can be adapted to target living creatures, all I need is some funding.

SoulfireDetonation.Name: Soulfire Detonation
SoulfireDetonation.Description: Blast the soul of your target with purifying flames. The ensuing explosion will destroy all around them.
SoulfireDetonation.UnboughtDescription: Soulfire is a dangerous thing. Careless use can destroy both the caster and all those in the surrounding area. I want to play with it.

FireBeam.Name: Fire Beam
FireBeam.Description: Incinerate an entire column with powerful flames
FireBeam.UnboughtDescription: I've been experimenting with burning different kinds of wood, amd I've heard of some super flammable stuff in the enchanted forest. Please bring me some.

PillarsOfDestruction.Name: Pillars of Destruction
PillarsOfDestruction.Description: Summon the annihilating pillars of creation to destroy your targets
PillarsOfDestruction.UnboughtDescription: A ancient magical staff is said to be buried with the dead rulers of Pholbos. I want it to try burning a piece.

CrossBlaze.Name: Cross Blaze
CrossBlaze.Description: A burning cross destroys all around your target
CrossBlaze.UnboughtDescription: I've heard that the wood of the ancient shrines in the forest holds untold power. Please bring me some so I can set it on fire.
